sentences.en: All his efforts avail to nothing.
sentences.cn: 他的一切努力都无济于事.

sentences.en: Far from resenting such tutelage, I am only too glad to avail myself of it.
sentences.cn: 我决不憎恨这种教育,相反, 我十分高兴对它加以利用.

sentences.en: Guests should feel at liberty to avail themselves of your facilities.
sentences.cn: 客人们应可以随意使用你们的设施。

sentences.en: He had the duty receptionist almost jumping through hoops for him. But to no avail.
sentences.cn: 值班的接待员几乎为他费尽了力气，但还是没用。

sentences.en: he tried to get his work recognized, but to little avail.
sentences.cn: 他试图使自己的工作得到认可，但却几乎毫无作用。

sentences.en: His eagerness will not avail against the fitness and skill of his opponent.
sentences.cn: 他求胜心切,但这并不能抵挡得住对手的健壮与技艺.

sentences.en: His efforts were to no avail.
I am afraid my eloquence did not avail against the facts.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我的雄辩也无补于事实了.

sentences.en: I avail myself of this opportunity to renew to you the assurances of my highest consideration.
I gladly avail myself of your offer.
sentences.cn: 我很乐意接受你的帮忙.

sentences.en: I'm afraid my help didn't avail you much.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我的帮助对你用处不大.

sentences.en: Now it's done, regrets are of no avail.
sentences.cn: 事已如此, 后悔也是枉然.

sentences.en: The speediest succour might avail to the preservation of his life.
sentences.cn: 赶紧抢救也许能保住他的生命.

sentences.en: They tried artificial respiration but it was of no avail.
sentences.cn: 他们试做人工呼吸,可是无效.

sentences.en: We opposed the proposal but to no avail.
sentences.cn: 我们反对这个提议,但没用.

sentences.en: We searched the whole area but all to no avail. Robbie had disappeared.
sentences.cn: 我们找遍了整个地区但毫无结果，罗比失踪了。

sentences.en: We tried to keep him alive but to no avail.
sentences.cn: 我们全力抢救他,但却徒劳无功.

words.tran_cn: 有效的，可得的；可利用的；空闲的

phrases.phrase: avail someone nothing of little (或 no) avail to li
phrases.tran_cn: 几乎（或根本）毫无作用；无助

trans.tran_en: to be helpful or useful to sb
